title: Blocky Sans in See's Candies
content:
Can anybody identify the black sans 'Candies' in the See's Candies logo is set in? Or recommend something similar?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316232936im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo-2_4051.jpg)
author: doubledaggers

comments.content:
The best I can suggest is to start with [Serpentine Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316232936/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/) and add the vertical terminals to the C and S.

It seems that square stressed sans fonts are not common at all.

- Mike Yanega
